item.title: Artdink announces ARTDINK GAME LOG catalog title ports for Switch, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Tail of the Sun and Aquanaut's Holiday start off the lineup.

Artdink has announced ARTDINK GAME LOG, a project to port and re-release games  previously developed by Artdink onto modern hardware. The first title, Tail of the Sun, will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on December 16 in Japan. The second title, Aquanaut’s Holiday, will follow for the same platforms in 2026. A third title will be revealed at a later date.

Here is an overview of Tail of the Sun, via its Steam page:

About

The “Weird Game of the Century” released on PlayStation returns! Tail of the Sun is a simple 3D action game where you control a caveman living a wild life. Wagashi-shaped nuts, An open-world field, and avant-garde techno music… Experience a wild, pure, and simple life.

Hone Your Beastly Skills! Primitive Life 3D Action

Tail of the Sun is a simple 3D action game where you control a primitive human as their guardian spirit, living a wild life.

Released for the PlayStation in 1994, its unique worldview earned it the reputation as a “once-in-a-century oddball game.”

The protagonist of this game is a primitive human. Their daily life was driven purely by instinct.

They slept when tired, gathered fallen nuts, hunted animals to satisfy their hunger.

This game recreates that wild, simple existence.

Wagashi-shaped nuts, an open-world field, scattered objects resembling human body parts, avant-garde techno music, and a caveman who suddenly falls asleep while head-sliding…

Experience a wild, pure, and simple life that appeals to your primal instincts.

Pile Up Ivory and Grab the Sun’s Tail!

The goal is to build a tower reaching the sun by stacking “ivory” obtained from hunting mammoths.

Primitive humans have weak legs and little strength, making even hunting small prey a struggle.

However, by eating nuts scattered across the field and the meat of hunted animals, they gradually grow stronger.

With this strengthened body, take down even stronger prey and develop your settlement.

Your strength will be passed down to the next generation of primitive people.

Someday, with a resilient body and weapons, you will be able to defeat your arch-enemy, the mammoth.

What will happen when the ivory tower reaches the sun?

Witness the next form of evolution.

ARTDINK GAME LOG Series

ARTDINK GAME LOG is a project to port and re-release game titles previously developed by Artdink onto modern gaming hardware.

It serves as a record (log) of Artdink’s game development journey. By reviving past masterpieces using current technology and platforms, it delivers nostalgia and rediscovery to longtime fans, while offering an unprecedented experience to new players.

Watch the opening movie below.

Opening Movie



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/artdink-announces-artdink-game-log-catalog-title-ports-for-switch-pc

item.title: LET IT DIE: INFERNO G-STAR 2025 trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

New story trailer ahead of release.

Publisher GungHo Online Entertainment and developer Supertrick Games have released the G-STAR 2025 trailer for LET IT DIE: INFERNO.

The roguelite survival action game will be playable at the Busan, South Korea exhibition from November 13 to 16, where GungHo Online Entertainment will also be giving away t-shirts, badges, and stickers.

Here is an overview of the game, via GungHo Online Entertainment:

LET IT DIE: INFERNO is a roguelite survival action game where you can engage in chaotic battles with grotesque monsters, enemy factions, and even other players.

Humanity had just recovered from the unprecedented cataclysm known as “Earth Rage,” when suddenly, a massive chasm appeared—large enough to swallow an entire city whole.​ Someone began calling the hole “Hell Gate,” and lying at its depths is the “Eye of the Reaper,” a powerful crystal containing the energy to rule the world. Explore, survive, and extract from the Inferno, where stage layouts and item placements differ every match.

​In this game, on top of PvEvP—where players and enemies collide within Hell Gate—there is also a mode for battling exclusively with other players. We hope you enjoy this powered-up version of the LET IT DIE world!

LET IT DIE: INFERNO is due out for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on December 3.

Watch the trailer below.

G-STAR 2025 Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/let-it-die-inferno-g-star-2025-trailer

item.title: RUSHING BEAT X: Return of Brawl Brothers launches March 19, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Switch 2 version ships on a full game card in Japan.

RUSHING BEAT X: Return of Brawl Brothers will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on March 19, 2026, publishers City Connection and Clear River Games announced.

In Japan, physical editions will be available 5,980 yen on PlayStation 5 and 6,980 yen on Switch 2. The Switch 2 version will ship on a game card (not a game-key card).

A limited edition will also be available for 7,980 yen on PlayStation 5 and 8,980 yen on Switch 2, which includes a SteelBook case, “RUSHING BEAT X Super Secret Encyclopedia” with a music CD, and a limited edition box.

Here is an overview of the game, via City Connection:

About

Neo-Cisco has been shaken by organized crime, a deadly virus and more, and each time justice and right have prevailed thanks to a small band of brave fighters. Now, they must rise up again to face an overwhelming evil and discover the true mastermind behind these past events.

Jaleco’s Rushing Beat returns, bringing a beat ’em up cocktail with new moves, new weapons, and new allies, and an exciting, two-player co-op story for double the impact!

Action

With easy-to-use auto-combos, even beginners can enjoy exhilarating action. Chain together your own combos with various actions like counterattacks, follow-up strikes, and weapon-based attacks. Most actions can be canceled with dashes or jumps. Master the cancel system and unleash even more consecutive attacks!

Throw techniques can be varied with key inputs. Send your targeted enemies flying, and if you throw them into the background, you can destroy normally unreachable objects, giving you a chance to acquire items!

As you land hits or take damage, your rage gauge increases. When the gauge reaches MAX, you enter rage mode. In addition to enhanced attack and defense abilities, you’ll also be able to unleash a finishing move called “Beat Rush.” Overcome evil with the power of righteous fury!

Chapters

Battle across varied locales: in shopping malls, slums, subways, and research facilities as you fight to uncover the truth and save the city once more! Challenge side-missions along the way, with challenges involving various actions and stage gimmicks!

Characters

With multiple characters, from series veterans Rick Norton and Douglas Bild and newcomers too, mastering the unique fighting style of each fighter is the key to success, with more unlocking more as you progress through the game. Two-player co-op adds a further layer of strategy, and fun: mix and match characters and find the perfect team!

Food

At the Tuff E Nuff, kitchen car, which also serves as a checkpoint in stages, you can combine the various food items you have. Creating combo meals with three types of food increases healing potential and may also grant special effects! Whether attacking or eating, combos are the way to go!

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/rushing-beat-x-return-of-brawl-brothers-launches-march-19-2026

item.title: Once Upon a KATAMARI DLC packs ‘Katamari Damacy Series Dance Dance Remixes’ and ‘Katamari Damacy Series Neo Remixes’ announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Due out in November and this winter, respectively.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer RENGAME have announced Once Upon a KATAMARI downloadable content packs “Katamari Damacy Series Dance Dance Remixes” and “Katamari Damacy Series Neo Remixes.”

“Katamari Damacy Series Dance Dance Remixes” will launch in November, followed by “Katamari Damacy Series Neo Remixes” this winter. Each pack includes five new remix tracks and ten accessories.

With each downloadable content release, users will also receive a special set of accessories via a free update.

Once Upon a KATAMARI is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/once-upon-a-katamari-dlc-packs-katamari-damacy-series-dance-dance-remixes-and-katamari-damacy-series-neo-remixes-announced

item.title: Gran Turismo 7 PS5 DLC ‘Power Pack’ announced
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Due out on December 4.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Polyphony Digital have announced Gran Turismo 7 paid downloadable content “Power Pack.” It will launch exclusively for the PlayStation 5 version on December 4.

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via Polyphony Digital:

About the Downloadable Content “Power Pack”

  • Fifty new races across six distinctive themes, featuring intense 24-hour endurance events
  • Experience a full race season, that includes practice and qualifying and the main event
  • Engage in close-quarters battles with Gran Turismo Sophy 3.0
  •  Includes 5,000,000 In-game Credits to jumpstart your racing journey

The “Power Pack” is a brand-new game mode that captures the true spirit of motorsports. It features 50 all-new races spread across six themes inspired by countries and car culture around the world. Take on grueling 24-hour endurance challenges, experience a full race season that includes practice to qualifying to the main event, and go wheel-to-wheel in heart-pounding, tail-to-nose battles against Gran Turismo Sophy 3.0, the latest evolution of our advanced AI racer—available exclusively in the “Power Pack.”

Get ready for pure, high-octane excitement. Sharpen your skills through relentless competition and feel the satisfaction that only true racing can deliver.

The “Power Pack” also includes 5,000,000 in-game Credits.

This is a new chapter in Gran Turismo—one that redefines what racing means. Stay tuned for more details.

  • Your “Power Pack” journey begins from the sailboat on the World Map.
  • Europe, Historic Cars, Nurburgring, and more—50 events across six themes celebrating countries and automotive culture.
  • Start with getting a feel for the car and track. Practice in real time just like a real race driver.
  • You can also use Practice to size up your rivals and perfect your lines before moving on to ‘Qualifying and the Race in full-session play.

Take On Races Based On Real Life Events

  • Group C Memories
  • Nurburgring Group 3
  • Civic Race ’90s
  • Japan GT500 ’90s

Gran Turismo 7 is available now for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/gran-turismo-7-ps5-dlc-power-pack-announced

item.title: Super Robot Wars Y ‘DLC #1: Contract from the Darkness’ launches November 20
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Version 1.1.0 update due out on November 17.

The Super Robot Wars Y version 1.1.0 update will launch on November 17, followed by the paid “Downloadable Content #1: Contract from the Darkness” on November 20, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Bandai Namco Forge Digitals announced. Early access for the downloadable content will begin on November 18.

Here is an overview of the new content:

  • Version 1.1.0 Update
    • Special Mission: “Battle Rush” added
    • EX Level Pilot Skills added
    • Downloadable Content #1 Mission #1:” A Smile on the Street Corner”
    • Other stability improvements
  • “Downloadable Content #1: Contract from the Darkness”
    • Five new playable units
    • 16 new Area Missions
    • 13 new Onboard Missions
    • Two new Assist Crew members
    • Featured series:
      • Galaxy Cyclone Braiger
      • The Big O
      • Fuuto PI: The Portrait of Kamen Rider Skull

Super Robot Wars Y is available now for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

“DLC #1: Contract from the Darkness” Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Wandering Sword coming to PS5 on May 28, 2026, Switch 2 and Switch in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Pre-orders now available.

Publishers Clouded Leopard Entertainment and Spiral Up Games, and developer The Swordman Studio will release 3D pixel Wuxia RPG Wandering Sword for PlayStation 5 on May 28, 2026, followed by Switch 2 and Switch later in 2026, the companies announced.

The game will be available digitally worldwide, as well both physically in Japan and Asia. Pre-orders for the digital edition are available now via PlayStation Store for $34.99 / £29.99 / €34.99 / ¥4,928. A Deluxe Edition will also be available for $44.99 / £39.99 / €44.99 / ¥6,578, which includes an accessory set and the digital soundtrack. Pre-orders for either version include 72 hours of early access and two original costumes.

Wandering Sword first launched for PC via Steam on September 15, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via Clouded Leopard Entertainment:

Console Versions

Originally developed by Shanghai-based indie studio The Swordman Studio, Wandering Sword is a 3D pixel wuxia RPG published by Singapore-based Spiral Up Games.

The game was first released for Steam in September 2023, where it has since received over 31,000 reviews and earned an “Overwhelmingly Positive” rating (94 percent positive), making it one of the most acclaimed indie titles of recent years.

The upcoming PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch 2, and Nintendo Switch versions published by Clouded Leopard Entertainment will include two major downloadable content packs previously released on Steam: “Mount Pack: The Supreme Steed” and “Immortal Trails Across the Blue Sea.”

In addition, these versions will feature newly recorded Japanese and Chinese voice=overs, as well as Japanese and Korean subtitles, allowing players to experience the sweeping Eastern epic in even greater depth.

Voice cast details will be announced at a later date—please stay tuned for future updates!

About

The story begins with a young swordsman gravely injured after being caught in a violent conflict. Having narrowly escaped death, you embark on a journey to master the martial arts and fulfill your destiny as a true hero in a vast, living wuxia world.

  • An Epic Story with 20 Endings – Your choices will dramatically alter the course of the story, which branches into 20 different endings. Dozens of side quests add further depth and replayability.
  • Dual Battle Modes – Battle strategically or act in real time—switch freely between turn-based command combat and real- time action on a tactical, tile-based battlefield. Master a variety of weapons and martial arts schools to become a true kung fu master!
  • Beautiful Pixel Art – Experience the breathtaking depiction of ancient China, brought to life through stunning, hand-crafted pixel art rarely seen in modern gaming.


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/wandering-sword-coming-to-ps5-on-may-28-2026-switch-2-and-switch-in-2026

item.title: MOTIONREC coming to PS5, Switch in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch

Puzzle action game currently available for PC.

Publisher PLAYISM and developer HANDSUM will release puzzle action game MOTIONREC for PlayStation 5 and Switch in 2026, the companies announced.

MOTIONREC first launched for PC via Steam on October 27.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

MOTIONREC is a recording puzzle action game where you progress through stages by recording and playing back your own movements.

Rec, The Civilization-Recording Robot

MOTIONREC is a recording-based puzzle action game built around the concept of recording and playback. Use this ability to guide Rec, the civilization-recording robot, through a devastated world.

The Power of MOTIONREC

You can record the trajectory of your movements, from walking to jumping. Use stage gimmicks to create and record more complex movements to traverse the world.

Record your movements…

…and play them back in another location!

This will let you reach places too high to jump up to, or even access spots where there’s nothing to stand on. You can only play back your movements a certain number of times midair, however, and this is refreshed every time you land on the ground.

Make good use of the MOTIONREC ability to unravel the mysteries behind this devastated world ruled by machines!

Staff

  • Studio: HANDSUM inc.
  • Pixel Art: m7kenji
  • Music: Kyohei Fujita
  • Developer: shoma


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/motionrec-coming-to-ps5-switch-in-2026

item.title: Octopath Traveler 0 ‘Prologue’ demo now available
item.content:encoded:
A “Prologue” demo for Octopath Traveler 0 is now available, publisher and developer Square Enix, and developer Dokidoki Grooveworks announced.

The demo allows users to create their own character, play for three hours, and carry over their save data to the full game when it launches. Travel beyond starting areas is restricted.

Octopath Traveler 0 is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on December 4 worldwide. Read more about the game here, here, and here.

Watch a new trailer below.

Story Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: MARVEL Tokon PS5 closed beta set for December 5 to 7
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Spider-Man and Ghost Rider join the fray.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Arc System Works will host a second closed beta test for MARVEL Tokon: Fighting Souls for PlayStation 5 from December 5 to 7, the companies announced. Both Spider-Man and Ghost Rider will join the fray this time for a total of eight playable characters, alongside the new stage X-Mansion. Registration is available now via PlayStation.com.

MARVEL Tokon: Fighting Souls is due out for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2026.

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation 5 Closed Beta Test #2 Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/marvel-tokon-ps5-closed-beta-set-for-december-5-to-7

item.title: Dynasty Warriors: Origins major DLC ‘Visions of Four Heroes’ pre-orders now available
item.content:encoded:
Pre-orders for Dynasty Warriors: Origins‘ major downloadable content “Visions of Four Heroes” are now available for $34.99 / £28.99 / €34.99 / ¥4,840, publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Omega Force announced. As previously announced, it will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on January 22, 2026, alongside the base game’s launch on Switch 2.

Get the latest details below:

“Visions of Four Heroes” features brand-new stories centered around four heroes whose stories were not explored in Dynasty Warriors: Origins—Zhang Jiao, Dong Zhuo, Yuan Shao, and Lu Bu. These stories are explored as “What If” scenarios and will allow players to discover new sides to these legendary heroes. New companions are also featured in the major downloadable content including Zhuhe, a Guardian of Peace; Diaochan, a beautiful warrior and a familiar fan favorite; and a mysterious new officer who will be revealed as the story unfolds.

Fans will also be able to enjoy new weapons—the “Bow” and “Rope Dart”—to further enhance the exhilarating action of one-versus-1,000 warfare by leveraging each weapon’s unique characteristics on the battlefield. Existing weapons will also receive an update, granting new arts, skill panels, as well as an increase in the trait level cap. Finally, a new “Training Ground” mode will be included, where players battle formidable foes while practicing their skills.

For a limited time, anyone who pre-orders “Visions of Four Heroes” will receive an exclusive outfit for the protagonist, the “Yellow Turban Attire.” Designed to embody the heroic spirit of Dynasty Warriors: Origins, this costume lets players take to the battlefield clad in the symbolic garb of the Yellow Turban Rebellion.

Dynasty Warriors: Origins is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

DLC “Visions of the Four Heroes” Reveal Trailer

English

Japanese

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/dynasty-warriors-origins-major-dlc-visions-of-four-heroes-pre-orders-now-available

item.title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined details adult Kiefer storyline, stone tablet fragments
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Meet Kiefer as an adult and fight alongside him.

Square Enix has released a new trailer, information, and screenshots for Dragon Quest VII Reimagined introducing a new storyline featuring Kiefer as an adult, as well as the fragments of broken stone tablets players must collect to expand the world.

Get the details below.

■ Discover a New Storyline Featuring Kiefer as an Adult!

Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is set to launch globally on Thursday, February 5, 2026. While the core elements from the original game remain, other aspects have been reimagined for more streamlined progression and fuller character development. The game also features new storylines, including one where you meet Kiefer as an adult and fight alongside him!

—As the protagonist continues his adventure in the Rucker region of the past, he meets his best friend, Kiefer, looking decidely older!

—The party sneaks into Rucker Castle at night, to help solve Kiefer’s troubles. Just don’t let the guards spot you!

—Kiefer has honed his skills considerably and will support you in battle with items and powerful abilities. Perhaps there’ll be opportunities to fight together again beyond the Rucker region…

■ Collect Fragments to Complete the Stone Tablets and Keep Expanding the World!

In Dragon Quest VII Reimagined, you must collect the fragments of broken stone tablets, then fit them all back together like a puzzle to open up new locations to visit. These new areas all have their own problems, and solving them will cause those locations to appear in the protagonist’s world, adding to the places you can explore. Seek out the stone tablet fragments scattered across the land and keep expanding the world!

—The shrine on the island where the protagonists live has multiple pedestals. Place the stone tablet fragments onto pedestals of the same color.

—Once complete, each stone tablet leads to a different location with its own set of problems to solve.

—Stone tablet fragments can be found in towns and dungeons or obtained by defeating powerful enemies.

—Solving the problem at the stone tablet’s destination triggers a chain reaction, causing changes in the protagonists’ world, like new islands that appear as if from nowhere!

↓

The Caretaker (voiced by Emma Stannard in English)

A mystical fairy encountered in the pedestal room of the Shrine of Mysteries. They’re said to have the duty of guiding the Chosen Ones to a new world.

Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on February 5, 2026 worldwide. Read more about the game here and here.

Watch the trailer below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

Follow-Up Trailer

English

Japanese

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/dragon-quest-vii-reimagined-details-adult-kiefer-storyline-stone-tablet-fragments

item.title: FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE launches March 12, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Digital Deluxe Edition and pre-order bonuses detailed.

Horror adventure game remake FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on March 12, 2026 for $49.99 / £44.99 / €49.99 / ¥6,380, publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Team NINJA announced.

In addition to the standard edition, a Digital Deluxe Edition will also be available for $69.99 / £52.99 / €64.99 / ¥8,580, which includes the base game, a digital soundtrack, and a digital art book, as well as the “Digital Deluxe Bonus Set” featuring the following in-game items: “Deluxe Charm,” “Lace Gloves (Black),” “Lace Gloves (White),” “Japanese Gothic (Right Wing),” and “Japanese Gothic (Left Wing).”

Early purchases include the “Early Purchase Bonus Set” featuring the following in-game items: “Wraith Charm,” “Peony Hair Ornament (Red),” “Peony Hair Ornament (Blue),” “Kimono (Black),” and “Kimono (Red).”

Pre-orders include the “Pre-Order Bonus Set” featuring the following in-game items: “Spirit Charm,” “Cat Ears (Black),” “Cat Ears (White),” “Crimson Butterfly – Mayu (Original),” and “Crimson Butterfly – Mio (Original).”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Get the latest details below.

FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE is a full remake of the second installment in the FATAL FRAME (PROJECT ZERO) series, originally released in 2003. The title has undergone a complete overhaul to offer a haunting experience, which has been beautifully reborn thanks to enhanced graphics, sound and controls elements.

The graphical enhancements offer a higher level of detail with refined textures, striking lighting and shadow contrast, generating a more haunting and realistic atmosphere than ever before. The sound has been revamped to offer spatial audio that will immerse players deep into the action, allowing them to enjoy a more authentic experience. Not only will they hear and feel the presence of spirits more intensely, but wraiths will appear when least expected, such as trying to grab the protagonist’s hands when reaching for an item or waiting in the shadows. Players will have to react quickly to escape these attacks. Failure to do so will inflict Willpower Damage, leading directly to intense combat.

The gameplay mechanics of the Camera Obscura, a signature feature of the FATAL FRAME franchise, have also been reworked to offer a more intense and rich experience during combat and exploration. Players will still be able to attack wraiths by taking photos, but managing to align the focus point with their target will inflict more damage. If the damage dealt exceeds a certain threshold, players will be able to activate Shutter Chance state, where they will then be able to deal significant damage with one single picture within a brief period—making it crucial for fans to be precise and to perfectly time their shot.

Players will be able to trigger a Fatal Frame by taking a shot at the perfect moment, which will interrupt and stun their opponent. If fans manage to trigger a Fatal Frame during a Shutter Chance state, they will activate a Fatal Time, a limited window that will allow them to take several shots in quick succession to inflict significant damage.

To confront the spirits lurking in the shadows of Minakami Village, players will be able to rely on new Camera Obscura features such as focus, zoom and filters. By lighting up the focus points on the screen, players will focus on their target and deal more damage to the spirits if they manage to light more focus points. By using the zoom feature, players will be able to attack a spirit from a distance while taking cover and being undetected and will also be able to attack multiple targets at once by zooming out. The zoom of the Camera Obscura will also help players during exploration as they will be able to photograph specific objects.

Lastly, the filters will help players to unravel the mysteries around them by changing filters depending on the situation or wraith they encounter. Among the different filters they can use, the Paraceptual Filter will allow them to increase their shooting distance in combat and, when exploring, to reproduce past actions using the residual memories.

In addition to these new mechanics, FATAL FRAME II: Crimson Butterfly REMAKE will introduce new gameplay features, such as being able to hold Mayu’s hand, which will recover players’ Health and Willpower. However, if Mayu is in danger, she may stumble and fall, requiring Mio’s help to get back up. Players will also be able to collect Charms they can equip, allowing them to benefit from various effects. By expanding the Charm Bag, the number of charms they can equip will increase.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/fatal-frame-ii-crimson-butterfly-remake-launches-march-12-2026

item.title: Coffee Talk Tokyo launches March 5, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

The next standalone chapter in the Coffee Talk series.

Coffee Talk Tokyo will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam on March 5, 2026, publisher and developer Chorus Worldwide, and developer Toge Productions announced.

A Collector’s Edition will also be available, which includes a 10-track “City Pop Album,” the “Seattle Prologue Chapter,” and an in-game digital art book.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Set in a late-night cafe in Tokyo, Coffee Talk Tokyo invites players to step into the role of the barista, brewing drinks that warm the hearts of humans and fantastical beings alike. Each cup influences the tone of every conversation, revealing the stories, dreams, and struggles of a completely new cast of characters.

Players can experiment with both hot and cold drinks, enhance their latte art with sprinkle stencils, and explore Tomodachill, an in-game social feed that unlocks hidden insights into their customers’ lives.

The experience is wrapped in a chill lo-fi soundtrack by Andrew “AJ” Jeremy, returning composer from Coffee Talk and Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly, blending calm jazz and soft beats inspired by Tokyo’s summer nights.

Key Features

  • New Cafe, New Stories – Meet an all-new cast of characters in a reimagined setting inspired by Tokyo’s nightscape.
  • Serve and Connect – Craft drinks that shape conversations and influence branching storylines.
  • Enhanced Creativity – Master new latte art tools, including sprinkle stencils for personalized designs.
  • Tomodachill Social Feed – Discover clues and connections that reveal new dialogue options.
  • Lo-Fi Soundtrack by Andrew “AJ” Jeremy – A fresh collection of relaxing tracks capturing the rhythm of city life.
  • Full Localization – Available in nine languages: English, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, Korean, French, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/coffee-talk-tokyo-launches-march-5-2026

item.title: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories. launches in April 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the 1990s.

inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories., a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game set in a small-town convenience store in early 1990s Japan, will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC and Mac via Steam in April 2026, publisher Beep Japan and developer Nagai Industries announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the early 1990s. Shelve goods, engage in meaningful conversations with your customers, and explore the ways you can impact their lives with your decisions.

Discover joy and wonder hidden behind the daily routine of a konbini worker, engage in meaningful conversations with a diverse cast of characters, and see how their stories intertwine in a beautifully-rendered early 1990s Japan.

inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a meditative third-person single-player experience that puts you in the shoes of Makoto Hayakawa, a college student taking a break from her studies to help her aunt at the small and cozy convenience store.

Over the course of the game, you’re going to establish your own ways of managing the store and see how your day-to-day decisions affect the lives of your customers.

You will learn their buying habits and develop a unique approach to each one of them in order to make their experience at the store smooth and pleasant.

strong>Key Features

  • A relaxing, narrative-driven experience focused on character stories and dialogue interaction;
  • A diverse cast of characters with their own distinct personalities, buying habits, and little quirks that make each encounter memorable;
  • A variety of accessible mini-games, carefully recreating a store clerk’s daily routine (restock products, make phone calls, scan goods, and checkout your customers);
  • An authentic, beautifully-rendered konbini with a nostalgic feel of the early 1990s;
  • A branching storyline with multiple dialogue options, offering deep conversational experience;
  • An ASMR sound designed to compliment your playtime with sensations of calm and solace.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Window Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/inkonbini-one-store-many-stories-launches-in-april-2026
